subject: Problem mit Motoren
description_text:
Good evening, unfortunately, I'm having problems one after the other. I
bought a set of three of these motors. Two of them stopped working after a
short time and smell awful. Now they doesent Work anymore. I don't put much
strain on the motors, only for ABS, gear shift, and wheelspin. How can you
help me here?

Beste regards
Simon Sander

conversations.body_text: Hi Simon Sander,    Please provide your order number, and we will have our engineers troubleshoot the problem for you.

Hallo, siehe Anhang.

Mfg
Simon Sander



service@simsonn.com
